mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, member_role, member_status, created_at, updated_at FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email = #{param1} AND member_pass = #{param2} AND member_status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, member_role, member_status) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPass}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, 'USER', 'ACTIVE')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_pass = #{newPassword}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
